product_name: Up the Lake With a Paddle - Volume One - Second Edition
long_description: This guide provides canoeists and kayakers with user-friendly information on the great places to paddle in the Sierra Foothills and Sacramento region. Author: William Van der Ven. Softcover; 296 pages; black-and-white photos; maps. Fine Edge Productions; copyright 2007. Tells you where to paddle, how to get there and what to expect on your trip. Describes in detail everything from classic trips for the strong solo paddler to family outings. Provides specific information on popular places to paddle as well as quiet and isolated waters worth visiting. Routes are well researched to provide new insights and appreciation for this part of the Sierra Foothills.
short_description: This guide provides canoeists and kayakers with user-friendly information on the great places to paddle in the Sierra Foothills and Sacramento region.
